Derivatives and Hedging: other comprehensive income loss reclassification adjustment from a o c i on derivatives net of tax
other comprehensive income unrealized gain loss on derivatives arising during period net of tax
Foreign Currency Translation: other comprehensive income loss foreign currency transaction and translation adjustment net of tax
Total Other Comprehensive Income: other comprehensive income loss net of tax
Unrealized Gains/Losses on Securities: other comprehensive income unrealized holding gain loss on securities arising during period net of tax

Other Equity Adjustments: adjustments to additional paid in capital other
temporary equity accretion to redemption value adjustment

Other Stock Issuance: issuances of capital stock net of forfeitures value
proceeds from issuance of common stock
proceeds from issuance of convertible preferred stock
proceeds from issuance of preferred stock and preference stock
stock issued during period value conversion of convertible securities
stock issued during period value new issues
Stock-Based Compensation: stock issued during period value share based compensation

Stock Repurchases: purchases and retirement of preferred stock and losses on purchases of preferred stock
stock repurchased and retired during period value
__unmapped__: issuances of capital stock net of forfeitures shares
noncontrolling interest increase from business combination
purchases and retirement of preferred stock and losses on purchases of preferred stock shares
share based compensation arrangement by share based payment award shares issued in period
stock issued during period shares conversion of convertible securities
stock issued during period shares new issues
stock issued during period shares share based compensation
stock repurchased and retired during period shares
